description: Issue preclusion applies - same issue fully litigated
facts: In first lawsuit, court found defendant ran a red light
Defendant fully litigated the red light issue at trial
New plaintiff sues defendant for injuries from the same red light incident
Defendant seeks to relitigate whether he ran the red light
asp_facts: claim(c1). claim_type(c1, collateral_estoppel). plaintiff(c1, new_plaintiff). defendant(c1, defendant). prior_issue(c1, ran_red_light). issue_actually_litigated(c1, yes). issue_necessary_to_judgment(c1, yes). full_opportunity(c1, yes). same_issue(c1, yes). issue_preclusion(c1, yes).
question: Is defendant precluded from relitigating the red light issue?
rationale: Collateral estoppel (issue preclusion) prevents relitigation of issues that were actually litigated and necessarily decided in a prior proceeding. Defendant had a full opportunity to litigate the red light issue and lost; the issue is now established.
